mapper.select: WITH EMPLOYEE_FRANCHISE_AREA AS ( SELECT C.CMMN_CODE_NM, F.FRANCHISE_ID FROM EMPLOYEE E INNER JOIN FRANCHISE F ON E.FRANCHISE_ID = F.FRANCHISE_ID INNER JOIN CMMNCODE C ON F.FRANCHISE_AREA = C.CMMN_CODE_ID WHERE E.EMP_ID = #{empId} ), OTHERSTAFFFRANCHISE AS ( SELECT F.FRANCHISE_ID, F.FRANCHISE_AREA, F.FRANCHISE_NM, F.FRANCHISE_TEL, F.FRANCHISE_ZIP, F.FRANCHISE_ADD1, F.FRANCHISE_ADD2, F.FRANCHISE_EMAIL, F.FRANCHISE_YN_AT, F.FRANCHISE_HOTEL_CO, F.EMP_NO, C.CMMN_CODE_NM FROM FRANCHISE F INNER JOIN CMMNCODE C ON F.FRANCHISE_AREA = C.CMMN_CODE_ID WHERE C.CMMN_CODE_NM = (SELECT CMMN_CODE_NM FROM EMPLOYEE_FRANCHISE_AREA) AND F.FRANCHISE_ID != (SELECT FRANCHISE_ID FROM EMPLOYEE_FRANCHISE_AREA) AND F.FRANCHISE_YN_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY F.ROWID ASC ) SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT OTHERSTAFFFRANCHISE.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM OTHERSTAFFFRANCHISE ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{paging.firstRecord} AND #{paging.lastRecord}

WITH EMPLOYEE_FRANCHISE_AREA AS ( SELECT C.CMMN_CODE_NM, F.FRANCHISE_ID FROM EMPLOYEE E INNER JOIN FRANCHISE F ON E.FRANCHISE_ID = F.FRANCHISE_ID INNER JOIN CMMNCODE C ON F.franchise_area = C.CMMN_CODE_ID WHERE E.EMP_ID = #{empId} ) SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FRANCHISE F INNER JOIN CMMNCODE C ON F.franchise_area = C.CMMN_CODE_ID WHERE C.CMMN_CODE_NM = (SELECT CMMN_CODE_NM FROM EMPLOYEE_FRANCHISE_AREA) AND F.franchise_id != (SELECT franchise_id FROM EMPLOYEE_FRANCHISE_AREA) AND F.FRANCHISE_YN_AT = 'Y'
